talents.option1: Laguna Blade damage is Pure and pierces Spell Immunity

abilities.desc: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.
abilities.name: Dragon Slave
abilities.notes: Dragon Slave can hit units up to 1225 units away.

abilities.desc: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.
abilities.name: Light Strike Array
abilities.notes: Light Strike Array will destroy trees in its area of effect.

abilities.desc: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina hits an enemy with a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts 18 seconds.
abilities.name: Fiery Soul
abilities.notes: Using items does not trigger Fiery Soul.

abilities.desc: Grants Lina unobstructed movement and increases her spell damage and magic resistance
abilities.name: Flame Cloak

abilities.desc: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.
abilities.name: Laguna Blade
abilities.notes: Laguna Blade has a 0.25 delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.
